doc.title: Red Assed Lap Dancing 17
doc.plot: Three more uppity models walk into the Red Hot Video studio, much to their later regret. All the action is over-the-knee and on the bare bottom. The sessions take about 15 to 20 minutes per girl. At the end they're crying, bawling, pouting, cursing and screaming and there's no doubt: these are some well spanked girls.
